about_the_game:
Frost Lands is an RPG Sounds pack of looping music and SFX. It includes:

Music
  • Arctic Hollow
  • Ice Battle Royale
  • Uncover the Ice Cave

SFX
  • Avalanche (4)
  • Bear (4)
  • Body Fall (4)
  • Distant Wolves (4)
  • Elk Passing (4)
  • Ice Kobolds Attack (4)
  • Ice Kobolds Hiss (4)
  • Ice Kobolds Pain (4)
  • Freezing Punch (4)
  • Freezing Arrow (4)

  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 capabilities
